pageContext.claim: “As a result of my negotiations with President Xi of China -- doing a very big trade deal -- they've announced that next week they will implement new measures to prevent Chinese fentanyl -- which is most of it; almost all fentanyl comes from China -- from being shipped to the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: China’s ban does not cover all of the precursor chemicals that are used to make fentanyl and its analogues. These chemicals are typically sent to Mexico from China and are used in composing the fentanyl that is used in the United States.
